subject: Sexual Health
title: Polycystic Ovary Syndrome
description: A quick win: understand Polycystic Ovary Syndrome.

hook.text: Small fluid-filled sacs form on the ovaries, disrupting hormones and affecting one in ten women.

buildup.text: PCOS causes irregular periods, excess androgen levels, and difficulty with ovulation.

discovery.text: It is one of the most common hormonal disorders and a leading cause of infertility worldwide.

twist.text: Despite the name, not all women with PCOS have ovarian cysts. The name itself is misleading.

climax.text: Managing PCOS through lifestyle, diet, and medication can significantly improve symptoms.

quiz.question: Do all women with PCOS have ovarian cysts?
